titleStmt.title: A poem upon a laurel leaf viris admodum Colendis, publicæ scholæ, vulgò dictæ, Harrow super montem, gubernatoribus ... / hoc qualecunquæ poema Guilielmus Bolton.
titleStmt.author: Bolton, William, 1650 or 51-1691.

notesStmt.note: English and Latin on facing pages.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
